summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from an individual (likely a prosecutor or legal professional) stating they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams in the case United States v. Epstein 19 Cr. 490 (RMB). The email provides contact information for urgent matters related to the Epstein case and for other matters.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: The Honorable Ronnie Abrams is mentioned as the judge before whom the email sender is currently on trial.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The email instructs that for immediate assistance in connection with United States v. Epstein, the recipient should contact AUSA (Assistant United States Attorney).

events.title: Email Out-of-Office Reply
events.description: An individual involved in the Epstein case sends an automated email reply stating they are on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 27, 2019, during the active criminal case against Jeffrey Epstein (19 Cr. 490).
The sender is a legal professional (likely a prosecutor) currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams.
The email provides specific contact instructions for urgent matters related to United States v. Epstein, indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
The document reference EFTA00014377 suggests it is part of a larger document production related to the Epstein case.
